website_summaries.verdict: The Razer Kraken Pro V2 is a well-designed, comfortable wired gaming headset with a reasonable price tag.
pros: Plush ear padding for comfortable fit
Nicely sculpted sound with good low-mid presence

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very good but microphone and volume control not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for 3 years. I always thought the microphone was a bit hissy but i put up with it. I had to return it once because when it came the volume wheel didn't function. Now a few years down the line the mic has a fair amount of wear and tear on the ear bit and the microphone barely works. Picks up way too much half the time and now the mic has too much hissing. Was it worth the near £80 at the time? Probably not. I would expect a Razer product to last more than 3 years, especially for such steep prices; I suppose that's why they halved the price over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, you might regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Both myself and a friend have these and the same issue. Volume control wheel is no good. His is completely broken and mine has a mind of its own full on full off. For such a company as Razer to put out such a low quality switch on Ann other wise good product is frustrating. Oh I have a Blade Pro so not just using on them here.
customer_reviews.author: Tep

customer_reviews.title: Broken headphones
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones on the 3rd of March 2018. The audio sound doesn't come through the headphone on one ear. We've had to order some more. They should last more than 6 months at 80quid. Please advise us on what procedures we can do to have a refund. Regards jayne beddis
customer_reviews.author: p beddis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Razer is the main company in which I buy my hardware. I currently have a Blackwidow Chroma keyboard by Razer and other previous headsets made by them. Amazing headset. Very comfortable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: poor mic (wobbly and feels cheap)
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected from Razer. Heavy bass, poor mic (wobbly and feels cheap). Bulky design, poor isolation and not greatest software support.They tend to get a bit warm after a couple hours of use.Decent for gaming. The wired design means they won't have any latency when gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the mic quality is pretty terrible and all of the software's 'enhancements' are sub ...
customer_reviews.text: Razer's software really lets this piece down, the mic quality is pretty terrible and all of the software's 'enhancements' are sub par to the enhancements given free by windows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He says there better than Astro's
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, and believe me when i say he has tried many headsets.He says there better than Astro's.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset perfect for casual and even competitive gaming. Love the fact that the mic its self can fold in when not in use. Would be 5 stars if the ear cups wernt as big aa they can get in the way a bit somthimes.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset.
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for these for Christmas and he is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Elainc

customer_reviews.title: Right ear doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Good headset but I bought used and it said it was in very good condition yet the right ear doesn't work. Probably gonna send it back and get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Returned Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I would have expected from such an expensive item
customer_reviews.author: George Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Great product in a dirty condition!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product however it is dirty, skin flakes in the earphones so if you buy, please buy new
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully for any video game that requires you to listen closely to your environement like PUBG
customer_reviews.author: Endre Steenberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think is one of the best headsets for gaming and music also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding audio quality for Gaming and just listening to Music. Ideal for Gamers or fans of music with a little more Bass. Very light, meaning they can be worn for long periods at a time but also meaning that excessive extra padding on ears isn't necessary but once you get past the size of the cups this is a great headset for the money. No microphone issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: nice, comfortable, very good sound quality and powerful, but not as much bass as I was expecting. Anyway it's better that the previous version, has various improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Some Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good price for a brilliant pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: A very good price for a brilliant pair of headphones. They are quite bulky, but soon get used to them and are very comfortable. Sound quality is good. Microphone quality is good. Anyone I talk to can hear me clearly. Obviously this is not top-of-the-range headphones from Razer, but considering the price, they blew me away. They also have a good stable build. These definitely met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: John Echo AY

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality it good and it's very comfy, but the mic isn't great and you have to have the sounds turned right down or there is mic echo from people talking and everyone can hear my game. Tryed on PS4 and Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Best £100 Headset.
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming headset you can buy for less than £100. Durable, Comfy, Amazing sound quality and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Opened new headphones and started hearing strange crackling sounds at the background when I played games or listened to music. The issue is with a bad jack and problem appears on every device I try them on. A slight move of the jack on phone downgrades the sound abd also wierd noices.
customer_reviews.author: Tgw

customer_reviews.title: Barely work
customer_reviews.text: Headset is full of issues, sometimes my friends can hear their voices, sometimes they can't hear me and sometimes I can't hear them. I've messed with all the settings possible and have all my drivers up to date, I think the spitter cable is faulty. Don't pay a premium price for a bad quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Hoogs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad design I miss Razer from the past. Don't buy it try to find older version
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after a few wks use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs at xmas for kids, not the cheapest but thought was going for quality. Wrong ... after a few wks of use one of the ears has no sound coming through and the microphone doesn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Els Fire

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son who was over the moon ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who was over the moon with it until it stopped working properly and just made a buzzing sound and now only works every now and again . Would have expected a bit more from a product at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Order if you like but be aware that there are other options better ones out there.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward for this item. However, the mic was not working when i received the item. I was expecting that in this price range the headset would be perfect. Didn't asked for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my PS4. The sound quality is OK, though for video gaming, it's fine. The bass is strong which is great for driving and fps games for instance - explosions, engines etc. To a certain extent, outside sound is blocked, but this is probably more down to the ear cup design, rather than high-end noise-cancelling tech. The microphone quality is good with no issues being heard. Not had any problems running these on my PS4 or when gaming. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. Very comfortable and fantastic clear sound. I have used them on my HP Omen Laptop, Nintendo Switch and my S7 Edge. They sound great across all devices. The cable splits into two with 1.2m from head phones to a single jack and another cable about 1.8m that connects from the single jack into 2 seperate jacks for connecting to a Laptop/PC. This cable is quite long and could potentially get damaged if your chair rolls over it so keep an eye out or by a shorter single to double jack cable. There many of these types of cable for sale on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: tcr333

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have had headphones before but nothing like these. The feel of these headphones are so comfortable and not bulky like some headphones can be. The sound is amazing and the ear pads are really good as in there is not a lot of ear pressure from them. These are well constructed and the mic is really nifty and flexible. It slides back really handy too if you just want to use these headphones for listening to music. Really chuffed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Pádraig Ó

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, lightweight headphones. Work flawlessly. Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these, been using the most with his of and work easily just by plugging in, no drivers or anything. The microphone slides easily in and out so out of the way when he's not using it. It comes with a detachable extra long cable so it can be normal length or super long which is handy. The headphones dome over his ears entirely and he says this makes them much comfiest to wear for long periods rather than his others which squish his ears a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bryony A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Do everything they should really well
customer_reviews.text: This headset has mainly been used with PS4. They have large padded ear pieces which are very comfortable even for extended periods. The fit is adjustable and should fit most people. The mic is retractable into one side. The sound quality from the earphones is excellent, and can cope with high volume. The mic works well. For a price of around £70 these are pretty good value and compare well to alternatives. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. A. Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp from Razer
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using these with a Mac. They were super easy to set up (no drivers or messing) and work perfectly. They are very comfortable and light with excellent padding around the head and ears (note: the ear padding is round rather than oval). Sound is superb and his friends are able to hear him clearly using the moveable mic. Overall a great pair of headphones from a top gaming company. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: MartinRG

customer_reviews.title: A reasonable headset with a good sound range
customer_reviews.text: A reasonable headset with a good sound range. Used in PUBG (for the online mic) as well as Skype, and general gaming and videos for audio testing. Quite tinny in higher ranges, it's fine as a gaming set but wouldn't recommend for wider use. Hearing game noise (player footsteps, shot direction) was perfectly fine and so as a gaming device these work excellently. Sound quality on the mic is acceptable and suitable for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: writeallthereviews

customer_reviews.title: Not Kraken Sound
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. These have almost no sound stage with a tighly compressed sound. There's a lack of clarity too. I expected better of Razer. I have a much cheaper pair of HyperX Cloud Stinger which sound way better as do my Turtle Beach 420Xs. I have many sets of headphones, eg AKG, sennheiser, V-Moda, etc. If I were buying, I'd seriously look at the competition and likely save money too.
customer_reviews.author: D Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Great set of phones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of phones. The sounds is really clear - we used a USB adapter for them, and they work brilliantly through it, and we had impressive results with recording too. The microphone design is really good too: flexible and stylish, but can be pushed away when you don't need them, and they are not too heavy for continued wear. Nicely packaged, they are a joy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. S. Bray

customer_reviews.title: works amazing for a few months
customer_reviews.text: works amazing for a few months, however when its more than 4 months old, a LOT of issues start to develop. I've had this with all Razer headsets and they're just terrible
customer_reviews.author: C C Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. These are better than all my previous gaming headphones. I love the sound quality... sensitive and nuanced but also plenty booming when appropriate. These really improve my gaming experience. I'm not very technical I'm afraid but I also love the retractable mic. Great for calls and for multi player gaming. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: n7misc

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Comparing these to my £200 Philips phones, these are a bit more boxy sounding in the treble region but nice and bassy though. A decent pair of headphones for the average user, I didn't use the mic part as I am not a gamer just a person who listens to a hell of a lot of music on my phone, HiFi, Alexa etc
customer_reviews.author: Music Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and fit. The ear muffs cover the ears and give good blocking if extraneous sounds. The sound is crisp with really good bass. The microphone is retractable and so ideal if you want to use these for listening to music. Hard to fault and excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardie

customer_reviews.title: I have tried many Headsets but this is the best. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have tried many Headsets but this is the best. Great sound, beautiful design and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Having 'road tested' them for a week he reckons they are good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT profess to be a big gamer but I know a man who is!! My nephew is a huge gamer and was so excited to try these out. Having 'road tested' them for a week he reckons they are good, but could be better.They are extremely comfortable and sit well on your head. The sound was pretty decent i terms of clarity and depth, but according to him could be improved upon. He hooked these up to a PS4 and found they did a good job at cancelling out background noise too. It's a simple plug and play job so no tricky set up, the only downside is that they are a touch on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: BCB & More

customer_reviews.title: Good to absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a recommendation of a mate but Jesus do I wish I'd payed more for a better head set. I can't deny their comfy and the price is nice, the sound is solid and the mic is great but it's just not worth the pain in the ass soft ware problems you get. The amount of bizzare problems you get just ain't worth it
customer_reviews.author: MTD

product_meta.title: Razer Kraken Pro V2: Lightweight Aluminum Headband - Retractable Mic - In-Line Remote - Gaming Headset Works With PC, PS4 & Mobile Devices - Black
product_meta.description:
To meet the demands of e-sports athletes and the top gamers today, the Razer Kraken Pro V2 brings a whole different slew of updates. Larger 50 mm audio drivers deliver richer sounds that is ideally balanced between in-game audio and team communications. Redesigned ergonomics including an unibody aluminium frame, ensure maximum comfort and extended durability.

Learn more about the Razer Kraken Pro V2 at the Razerzone website.



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Kraken Pro V2
Quick start guide
Razer Sticker
Confirmation of Razer (Razer Certificate)
feature_bullets: To provide you with high audio immersion, the 50 mm Razer custom tuned drivers have been designed and tuned to deliver richer audio than ever before
The distinct sound signature of these impressive drivers produces crystal clear highs and rumbling lows that will put you in the middle of the action
Optimum form has been an integral focus in the design of the Razer Kraken Pro V2; no matter how long your gaming sessions are, you’ll feel as comfortable as a pro
Made of bauxite aluminium, the improved headband of the Razer Kraken Pro V2 is both lightweight and extremely flexible, so you get high durability, without sacrificing comfort
Fully-retractable microphone with in-line remote for crystal clear communication

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars228 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
